<L>6685<pc>452-1<k1>mAdrIputra<k2>mAdrIputra<h>3
{@Mādrīputra@}<sup>3</sup>¦ (do.), dual ({%°au%}) = Nakula and Sahadeva:
I, 4855, 4879, 5742, 7399, 7465; II, 2157, 2621; III,
11503, 11739, 14987, †15658, 17225; IV, 2294, 2319; V,
†653, †660, †711, 3207, 4426, 4657, 4791, 4826, 5152, 5854;
VI, 711, 2068, 2473, 2733, 2744, 2746, 3694, 3865, 4508,
4669, 4782, 4799, 4912, 5074, 5228, 5559; VII, 1380, 1509,
3562, 3566, 6626, 8805 (C. by error {%°aṃ%}), 8811; VIII,
1638, 1690, 2360, 2709, 2710, 3183, 3194, 3206, 3210,
4864, 4872, 4991, 4999; IX, 156, 164, 400, 453, 516, 550,
646, 652, 656, 779, 832, 961, 1019, 1021, 1026, 1064, 1373;
1725, 1956, 3481; X, 550; XII, 1379, 1396, 1464, 6231;
XIII, 7772.
